data.text:
@waprogalliance @westaustralian @PeterJohnLaw You have a variety of masks! 😂

That, honestly, says it all. You’re hysterical.

A 24 hour news cycle and a fear mongering media has made you lose all sense of proportion. Covid has a mortality less than 0.05%.

You’re behaving ridiculously.

@David39773232 @westaustralian @PeterJohnLaw Hahaha, yeah I’m the hysterical one…
(Soy milk is gross btw 🤢) I have a variety of masks and wear one for at least 8 hours a day. Haven’t worn one for the flu but will start this season. It’s a good idea that has been done in other countries for years.

@waprogalliance @westaustralian @PeterJohnLaw You’re the classic “masks are no hardship” as you put one on to go in the coffee shop, order your soy latte, then take it off when you sit down. 

Heroic because you wore one on the bus!

Care to respond to my points, by the way?

When are you going to stop being hysterical?

@David39773232 @westaustralian @PeterJohnLaw I believe in restrictions. They are real. Had to wear a mask on the bus. It was the most horrible experience of my life. This tyrannical govt. must be stopped.

@waprogalliance @westaustralian @PeterJohnLaw You still believe in restrictions. Don’t you?

I just answered your two points, do me the courtesy?

I’ll underline mine. 0.05% and under covid cases requiring ICU in NSW (the same demographic).

Nobody is testing in WA because the majority realise covid is no longer to be feared
@David39773232 @westaustralian @PeterJohnLaw Hysterical? Hahaha. What are talking about

@David39773232 @westaustralian @PeterJohnLaw 1. Don’t you have anything better to do?

2. Why would I trust you about this or anything?
